hanzi-su-wiki:
緒

Значения

Шнур, тесьма; начало

Мнемоника

Шнур — то, что 者 состоит из ниток 糸.

Варианты

緖, 绪

xù
beginnings; clues; mental state; thread
начала; подсказки; психическое состояние; нить
rtega_mnemonic:
緒緒RSend of thread, beginning, thread, mental state
  • person working on the fields every day 者 binds his clothes with a thread 糸: has a beginning and end and holds his mental state

(Simplified: 绪)
Pictophonetic: 者 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 者 [ zhě ] that which; they who; those who
heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman has believed that his puppet brings him luck since its inception. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: thong, thread, spiderman, someone, puppet, sooty, old man, sun, day
heisig_story: Thread . . . puppet. Although we usually think of a thong as coming at the end of a piece of string, this character's meaning allows for it to come at the beginning as well.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: thong, beginning, inception, end, cord, strap
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: плеть, начало, начало, конец, шнур, ремень
koohiiStory1: Spiderman has a secret fetish, he likes nothing better than to dress his lovedoll in a thong. Wierd, eh!
koohiiStory2: A thread is just the right size for a puppets thong.
jp_example_words:
情緒(じょうしょ): emotion, feeling
一緒(いっしょ): together, meeting, company
jp_readingExamples: 緒戦 (しょせん), 由緒 (ゆいしょ), 端緒 (たんしょ), 緒 (お)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You thread someone together with thread. Someone is falling apart so you use thread to put them back together.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine taking some thread and putting someone back together with it. It’s awfully messy. I hope you’re good with blood.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You’re threading this someone back together as part of a show (しょ). The show is a demonstration to show med students how to thread someone’s skin together after they have an accident. You’re the most experienced, so you’re leading the show.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine threading someone back together again, but this time you have an audience. Hear them “ooh” and “aah” as you put on a riveting show.
Ru_Meaning: thong, beginning, inception, end, cord, strap, mental or emotional state
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 諸 (もろ、ショ различные, несколько)
Ru_Words:
緒お
  • шнур, шнурок, тесьма, завязка, струна
    • 緒いとぐち
  • конец нити
  • начало
  • путеводная нить, ключ (к тайне и т п.)
    • 緒しょ
  • начало
    • 一緒いっしょ
  • вместе, одновременно
  • такое же, одинаковое
    • 情緒じょうしょ
  • чувство, эмоция
    • 端緒たんしょ
  • начало, почин, первый шаг
  • ключ (к разгадке)
    • 由緒ゆいしょ
  • происхождение, родословная
    • 生の緒にいきのおに
  • рискуя жизнью
    • 緒に就くしょにつく
  • приступать к делу
Ru_Radicals: 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 老 (старик), 日 (день), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese: xù: (графема) концы шелковой нити; начало; (книжн.) остаток; (книжн.) дело, миссия; душевное состояние
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the person (者) has a thread (糸) strap
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The inception of my puppet began with the first piece of thread.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", "者" sound. The original meaning is silk head. "Said Wen": "Xu, silk 耑 also. From Shito, the voice." Such as "Mozi. Fei Le Shang": "Women are happy to sleep at night, spin and weave, use hemp silk and Ge Xu, and bind cloth. This is also the division of affairs." "Jiao Shi Yilin. "Yu": "My fellow, hungry, coma, and entangled in a mess, unavailable thread."

" Xue " extension means the beginning and the clue. Such as "Huainanzi. "Spirit": "The end of the repetition, the beginning is unknown." "Han Shu. "The Six Kings of Xuanyuan": "Since the beginning of the thread, I hope that the death will become it."

" Xu " means leftover and unfinished. "Guang Ya. Interpretation of Scripture Three: "Xu, Yu Ye." Such as "Chu Ci. Chapter Nine. "Shejiang": "Take Ezhu and go back, hey, the wind of autumn and winter." "Zhuangzi. "Father of the Fisherman": "Mr. Yue Zhe leaves with an introduction, Qiu is not, but I don't know what the so-called." Guo Qingfan's collection of interpretations quotes Yu Yue and said: "For those who have made an introduction, there are more words. There are endless words before the words of the master, so Said the introduction."

" Xu " means (legacy) career. "Er Ya. Interpretation: "Xu, things are also." Such as "Poetry. Lu Song. "Yugong": "As for civil and military affairs, we can keep the thread of the great king." Sima Qian of the Western Han Dynasty (Report to Ren Anshu): "The servants of the ancestors have to deal with their careers and have to wait for more than 20 years."

" Xu " is extended to mean lineage and system. Such as "Selected Works. Zhang Pingzi "Tokyo Fu": "Fu's house in the early Han Dynasty, so Zongxu Zhongxu." Xue Zong's note: "Xu, Tongye." "Zhongxu" means midway decline. Another example is "Wen Xin Diao Long. "Attached Meeting": "If the unification of Xuxu is lost, the words and flavors will be chaotic, and the meaning and veins will not flow, the style will be dry."

" Xu " also means searching for interpretation and sorting. Such as "Han Shu. "Zhang Zhou and Zhao Ren Shentu Biography": "(Zhang) Cang is planning phase, Xu Zhenglili." Yan Shi ancient notes quoted Ying said: "Xu, looking for also, it is said that the original thread is unified and correct." "Xin Yu. Daoji": "So the Hou Sheng Nai set the "Five Classics", Ming "Six Arts", inheriting the heaven and the earth, investigating the poor, establishing the original feelings, and the human relationship, and the world."

" Xu " means thoughts and emotions. For example, Liang Jiangyan's "Weeping Fu" in the Southern Dynasties: "Silence is to think, and emotions remain." Zhang Jiuling of the Tang Dynasty "Jingzhou": "Thousands of thoughts are still lost, and there are many threads."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸", "者" sound. The original meaning is silk head, and the extension means the beginning and the clue.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「者」聲。本義是絲頭。《說文》：「緒，絲耑也。从糸，者聲。」如《墨子．非樂上》：「婦人夙興夜寐，紡績織紝，多治麻絲葛緒，綑布繰，此其分事也。」《焦氏易林．豫》：「同人，蚕飢作室，昏多亂纏，緒不可得。」

　　「緒」引申表示開端、頭緒。如《淮南子．精神》：「反覆終始，不知其緒端。」《漢書．宣元六王傳》：「既開端緒，願卒成之。」

　　「緒」表示殘餘的、未盡的。《廣雅．釋詁三》：「緒，餘也。」如《楚辭．九章．涉江》：「乘鄂渚而反顧兮，欸秋冬之緒風。」《莊子．漁父》：「曩者先生有緒言而去，丘不肖，未知所謂。」郭慶藩集釋引俞樾曰：「緒言者，餘言也。先生之言未畢而去是有不盡之言，故曰緒言。」

　　「緒」表示（遺留的）事業。《爾雅．釋詁》：「緒，事也。」如《詩．魯頌．閟宮》：「至于文武，纘大王之緒。」西漢司馬遷〈報任安書〉：「僕賴先人緒業，得待罪輦轂下，二十餘年矣。」

　　「緒」引申表示世系、系統。如《文選．張平子〈東京賦〉》：「漢初弗之宅，故宗緒中圮。」薛綜注：「緒，統也。」「中圮」意謂中途衰敗。又如《文心雕龍．附會》：「若統緒失宗，辭味必亂，義脈不流，則偏枯文體。」

　　「緒」還表示尋繹、整理。如《漢書．張周趙任申屠傳》：「（張）蒼為計相時，緒正律曆。」顏師古注引文穎曰：「緒，尋也，謂本其統緒而正之。」《新語．道基》：「於是後聖乃定《五經》，明《六藝》，承天統地，窮事察微，原情立本，以緒人倫，宗諸天地。」

　　「緒」表示思緒、情思。如南朝梁江淹〈泣賦〉：「闃寂以思，情緒留連。」唐代張九齡〈荊州作〉：「千慮且猶失，萬緒何其紛。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「者」聲。本義是絲頭，引申表示開端、頭緒。

①絲的頭：“白鶴飛兮繭曳緒”。
②開端：頭緒。就緒。緒論。緒言。
③前人未完成的事業，功業：緒功。緒業。繼未竟之緒。
④連綿不斷的情思：情緒。思緒。心緒。離情別緒。
⑤殘餘：緒餘。緒風。
⑥姓氏。

從「 糸 」，「 者 」聲。本義是絲頭。《說文》：「緒，絲耑也。从糸，者聲。」如《墨子．非樂上》：「婦人夙興夜寐，紡績織紝，多治麻絲葛緒，綑布繰，此其分事也。」《焦氏易林．豫》：「同人，蚕飢作室，昏多亂纏，緒不可得。」 「 緒 」引申表示開端、頭緒。如《淮南子．精神》：「反覆終始，不知其緒端。」《漢書．宣元六王傳》：「既開端緒，願卒成之。」 「 緒 」表示殘餘的、未盡的。《廣雅．釋詁三》：「緒，餘也。」如《楚辭．九章．涉江》：「乘鄂渚而反顧兮，欸秋冬之緒風。」《莊子．漁父》：「曩者先生有緒言而去，丘不肖，未知所謂。」郭慶藩集釋引俞樾曰：「緒言者，餘言也。先生之言未畢而去是有不盡之言，故曰緒言。」 「 緒 」表示（遺留的）事業。《爾雅．釋詁》：「緒，事也。」如《詩．魯頌．閟宮》：「至于文武，纘大王之緒。」西漢司馬遷〈報任安書〉：「僕賴先人緒業，得待罪輦轂下，二十餘年矣。」 「 緒 」引申表示世系、系統。如《文選．張平子〈東京賦〉》：「漢初弗之宅，故宗緒中圮。」薛綜注：「緒，統也。」「中圮」意謂中途衰敗。又如《文心雕龍．附會》：「若統緒失宗，辭味必亂，義脈不流，則偏枯文體。」 「 緒 」還表示尋繹、整理。如《漢書．張周趙任申屠傳》：「（張）蒼為計相時，緒正律曆。」顏師古注引文穎曰：「緒，尋也，謂本其統緒而正之。」《新語．道基》：「於是後聖乃定《五經》，明《六藝》，承天統地，窮事察微，原情立本，以緒人倫，宗諸天地。」 「 緒 」表示思緒、情思。如南朝梁江淹〈泣賦〉：「闃寂以思，情緒留連。」唐代張九齡〈荊州作〉：「千慮且猶失，萬緒何其紛。」

緒字的基本解释

緒
xù
见“绪”。

緒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《廣韻》徐吕切，上語，邪。］
亦作“緖1”。“绪1”的繁体字。
(1)丝头。
(2)引申为丝或丝状物。
(3)开端；头绪。
(4)统系，世系。
(5)行列。
(6)前人未竟之功业。
(7)残余。
(8)连绵不断的情思、意绪。
(9)寻绎；序次。
(10)顺从。参见“緒信”。
(11)指著作的前言。
(12)姓。明代有绪纪、绪珊。见《古今万姓统谱》卷七六。

緒字的康熙字典解释
緒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
緒字的起名意思

暂无。

thread
Basic explanation of words
thread
xù
See "Xue".
thread
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xù］
["Guangyun" Xu Lvqie, Shangyu, evil. ]
Also known as "Thread 1". Traditional characters of "緒1".
(1) Silk head.
(2) The extension is silk or silk-like objects.
(3) The beginning; the clue.
(4) Lineage, descent.
(5) The ranks.
(6) Unfinished achievements of the predecessors.
(7) Residual.
(8) Continuous feelings and emotions.
(9) Search for interpretation; sequence.
(10) Obedience. See "Xishin".
(11) Refers to the preface of the work.
(12) Last name. There were Xuji and Xushan in the Ming Dynasty. See Volume 76 of "Ancient and Modern Genealogy of Ten Thousand Surnames".
thread

thread

thread
Name meaning
Nothing.
xù
вм. 绪
Radicals: 糸, 者  (thread, someone)
Meaning Mnemonic
You thread someone together with thread. Someone is falling apart so you use thread to put them back together.
Imagine taking some thread and putting someone back together with it. It’s awfully messy. I hope you’re good with blood.
Reading Mnemonic
You’re threading this someone back together as part of a show (しょ). The show is a demonstration to show med students how to thread someone’s skin together after they have an accident. You’re the most experienced, so you’re leading the show.
Imagine threading someone back together again, but this time you have an audience. Hear them “ooh” and “aah” as you put on a riveting show.
